data_table.description: Peripheral Arterial Tone, Original Cohort Exam 28, Generation 3, and New Offspring Spouse Cohorts Exam 1

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID

variable.name: BEGOCC
variable.description: START TIME OF OCCLUSION (MIN:SEC) (TIME8.)

variable.name: ENDOCC
variable.description: END TIME OF OCCLUSION (MIN:SEC) (TIME8.)

variable.name: OCCDUR
variable.description: OCCLUSION DURATION (SHOULD BE 5 MINUTES, ACCEPTABLE TO 5 MINUTES 30 SECONDS) (MIN:SEC) (TIME8.)

variable.name: BLDUR
variable.description: DURATION OF THE RECORDED BASELINE (MIN:SEC) (TIME8.)

variable.name: BLROI
variable.description: DURATION OF THE BASELINE SEGMENT TAKEN FOR CALCULATION OF MEAN BASELINE AMPLITUDE (ROI=REGION OF INTEREST)(MIN:SEC) (TIME8.)

variable.name: SIGDUR
variable.description: DURATION OF WHOLE STUDY (MIN:SEC) (TIME8.)

variable.name: WARNERR
variable.description: WARNINGS/ERRORS

variable.name: REMARK1
variable.description: REMARK 1 (FINGERNAIL CONDITION)

variable.name: ERROR
variable.description: ERROR

variable.name: WARNING
variable.description: WARNINGS

variable.name: RESULT
variable.description: PAT RESULT/RH INDEX (RATIO)

variable.name: HR
variable.description: BASELINE HEART RATE, BPM

variable.name: AI
variable.description: AUGMENTATION INDEX (CALCULATED AS THE PERCENT DIFFERENCE BETWEEN FIRST AND SECOND PEAKS OF THE SIGNAL WAVEFORM)

variable.name: AI_N
variable.description: AUGMENTATION INDEX PULSES (NUMBER OF PULSES FROM WHICH THE AVERAGE WAVEFORM THAT IS USED IN THE AI CALCULATION WAS DRIVEN)

variable.name: AI_T1
variable.description: AI_T1 (POINT OF TIME AT WHICH THE FIRST PEAK OCCURS AS MEASURED FROM THE INITIATION OF THE AVERAGED WAVEFORM) (MILLISECONDS)

variable.name: AI_T2
variable.description: AI_T2 (POINT OF TIME AT WHICH THE SECOND PEAK OCCURS AS MEASURED FROM THE INITIATION OF THE AVERAGED WAVEFORM) (MILLISECONDS)

variable.name: VALIDBL
variable.description: PERCENT VALID SIGNALS DURING BASELINE (USED TO CALCULATE SCORE)

variable.name: VALIDSIG
variable.description: PERCENT VALID SIGNALS DURING POST OCCLUSION (USED TO CALCULATE SCORE)

variable.name: OCCBORD
variable.description: OCCLUSION BORDERS - SHOWS WHERE OCCLUSION BORDER IS MANUALLY CORRECTED IN CASES WHERE THE AUTOMATIC ANALYSIS DID NOT DETECT CORRECT BORDERS (AUTOMATIC OR MANUAL)

variable.name: DBP
variable.description: DIASTOLIC BLOOD PRESSURE ENTERED BY TECHNICIAN, MMHG

variable.name: MEANBLO
variable.description: BASELINE AVERAGE AMPLITUDE OF THE OCCLUDED SIDE

variable.name: O0_30
variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 0 TO 30 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE OCCLUDED SIDE

variable.name: O30_60
variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 30 TO 60 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE OCCLUDED SIDE

variable.name: O60_90
variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 60 TO 90 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE OCCLUDED SIDE

variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 90 TO 120 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE OCCLUDED SIDE

variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 120 TO 150 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE OCCLUDED SIDE

variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 240 TO 270 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE OCCLUDED SIDE

variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 270 TO 300 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE OCCLUDED SIDE

variable.description: BASELINE AVERAGE AMPLITUDE OF THE CONTROL SIDE

variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 0 TO 30 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE CONTROL SIDE

variable.description: RATIO BETWEEN MEAN AMPLITUDE OF SEGMENT 30 TO 60 SECONDS POST OCCLUSION TO THE BASELINE AMPLITUDE ON THE CONTROL SIDE
